reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater set stylish, comfortable, and well-made, with soft fabric that feels luxurious to wear. They appreciate its versatility for casual events, and one customer mentions it works well for WFH lounge wear. The fit and sizing receive mixed feedback - while some find the pants length perfect, others say the top is too short, and while some find it runs true to size, others note it runs big and long

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Casually elegant pants set
items.body: Very casual but classic sweater set. Styling like St J*hn or other high end ladies lines. I’m a fan of the contrast edging. Fabric is a tight yarn knit with a nice easy hand. Some stretch but no bagging. It hangs well but shows every imperfection (like cellulite) so opt for a darker color if that’s a concern. I suspect shapewear will show through the lighter color. Styling is classic and flowing but fitted just enough. The length is perfect for me, I thought it might be too long. If you’re taller than 5-5 the pants may be too short. I would launder on delicate and lay flat to dry. Perfect for travel and office days. Read more
items.author: Melissa R

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Highly recommended
items.body: Love it! So cute and comfy. Lots of compliments and nice fit. Washing was easy and didn’t shrink at all. I totally recommend this darling outfit! Read more
items.author: RoseAnna Marie LeBlanc

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Must have!
items.body: I recently purchased this knit pants suit in green, and for the most part, I like it. The quality, feel, and look exceeded my expectations, with the exception of the color. I ordered the green and, in the pictures, it seems like a dark evergreen, but in person, it is not a nice color, it’s more of a muddy green, so I will have to exchange it for a black. The fit is great, comfortable, and flattering. At 5 feet the length is fine for me, the pants could be a bit longer but since I purchased them as loungewear it’s fine. The top is nice, it’s a loose fit, with a nice drape. Except for the color this set is great. What I love most is the versatility of this outfit. I can wear this at home and feel put together or step out to run a quick errand and feel presentable. Read more
items.author: Sandra

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars You won't be Disappointed.
items.body: I am 5'1", 151 lbs. I ordered a medium. Fit perfect except for length. Not a huge problem because the wide elastic waist band is very comfortable and can be rolled one turn and it shortened it the exact amount I needed.However I pulled it up about 2 " above the waist and it stayed there and did not slide down. I wore it to a Father's Day dinner and had many compliments from women and men alike. I bought this to throw on when we travel. BTW it didn't wrinkle at all. I read the reviews and I will wash it on gentle in a mesh bag and lay flat to dry. Quality fabric, very comfortable in NC in June med 80's. I ordered black, no see through, thick enough to hide your flaws. Pants flow beautifully when you move. Looks good on dance floor. Very satisfied. Plus I didn't have to wash it before I wore it. No smell at all, which is very unusual. Read more
items.author: Southern Belle

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So Nice!
items.body: This set is lovely. I washed it once I received it and it washed beautifully with no shrinkage. I did not put it in the dryer, however. It is true to size. I usually wear between size 12 to 14 so I purchased a large and it fit perfectly. I am 5’3”, and the length is fine. The fabric is a nice quality, not too thick and not too thin. It’s almost like light sweater material, but can be worn in warmer weather. I like that you can lounge in it or dress it up. I can see myself wearing this to work as a teacher. Super comfortable! Unfortunately, it does not have pockets, but otherwise I love it! Read more
items.author: JayCee

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Fit… Unless You’re Tall
items.body: Really comfy and great quality! I’m 5’9” and 150 lbs - the fit is nice overall, but the pants are a bit short if you have long legs. Read more
items.author: Olivia Holland

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice lightweight material
items.body: Beautiful 2 piece set, great for summer or fall days. Nice thin not itchy material, not see through. Love the wide leg look, order the black and now going back for another color. I wore this with sandals because it's still very warm in September, but for a chilly day a bootie will look great. I ordered small, 5'3 and 130 pounds. Read more
items.author: colleen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Feel good and beautiful outfit.
items.body: This outfit is so pretty and feels so good to wear that I bought another one for my adult daughter! Read more
items.author: Trudy Meyer

short_description:
Womens Dress Wide Leg Short Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Dress Wide Leg Short Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Navy, Khaki, Pink, Rust, Blue, Greygreen, Apricot, Black, Darkkhaki, Armygreen, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
